mapper.insert: insert into user ( username, password, email, accountType, isAdmin, accuracy, overallExp ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{accountType}, #{isAdmin}, #{accuracy}, #{overallExp} )
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, accuracy = #{accuracy}, overallExp = #{overallExp} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select userId, username, password, email, accountType, isAdmin, accuracy, overallExp from user
